segments.text: so ... what kind of things do you do in your free time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm really into watching foreign films . what about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like to do just about anything outdoors . Do you enjoy camping ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: camping for an evening is ok , but I couldn't do it for much longer than one night !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you ever been camping in the Boundary Waters ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , but I've always wanted to do that . I've heard it's a beautiful place to go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's fantastic . My family and I are very fond of the place .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: do you have any photos of any of your camping trips there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sure , would you like to see them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that'd be great . What kind of camera do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a Canon SLR .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: so , you must be pretty interested in photography then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd call it one of my hobbies . Do you know much about photography ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: actually , I do . I took quite a few photography classes at University .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you heard about the photography exhibit that's going on at the art gallery this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , I was planning on going . Are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes.In fact , maybe we could go together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that'd be great . what time should I meet you there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how about at 11:00 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sounds great . see you then .
segments.speaker: S2
